document.full_text: peter munk, the founder and chairman of barrick gold, told investors at the annual meeting on wednesday that, notwithstanding the company's bid for copper miner equinox, barrick remains firmly committed to being the world's top gold miner.
document.title: barrick attempts to soothe fears over equinox bid
lines_and_colors: peter munk, the founder and chairman of barrick gold, told investors at the annual meeting on wednesday that, notwithstanding the company's bid for copper miner equinox, barrick remains firmly committed to being the world's top gold miner.
